Tournaments Information
The Golden Bear Club golf and event staff will assist you every step of the way when planning your golf tournament with us. Whether you are a first-time tournament coordinator or a professional tournament planner, we will help you overcome the challenges of meeting financial goals and organizing a successful golf tournament. We are your immediate resource for all your tournament and event-planning needs.
The Golden Bear Club is structured to support organizations of all sizes host successful and profitable golf tournaments. Our extensive tournament planning experience has helped us develop and utilize the right people, event space, network, and systems needed to plan tournaments and events with successful results.  We have a proven track record of hosting and organizing tournaments and events for associations, charities, schools and universities, churches and ministries, civic groups and foundations, and business corporations.

About the Course
We are currently in the process of completing website ADA compliance.
Prepare yourself for an unparalleled golfing experience. Our course is a pleasure for golfers of any skill level to play. Test your accuracy with our fairways, water hazards and sand traps; we have everything you need to challenge you and improve your game.

Members Login
Membership Information
Become a member at one of the finest golf facilities in your area. We offer a variety of membership options, including golf and social, to suit your needs. Our golf membership is perfect for those who want to get out on the course any day of the week and still enjoy all other amenities the club offers. Social members can enjoy our dining facility, tennis courts, pool, snack bar, and fitness center.
All benefits of joining The Golden Bear Club are listed below (
access to amenities may vary based on membership type
):
Full Golf Course Privileges Including Unlimited Access to Practice Facility
Advanced Tee Time Booking Privilege
Full Service Locker Rooms
World Class Tennis Facility with Four (4) Hard Courts with Lights for Evening Play
Swimming Pool with Cushioned Pool Chairs, Tables, and Umbrellas
Private Fitness Facility with State-of-the-Art Exercise Equipment, Free Weights, and Stretch Room
On-site Personal Training and Fitness Classes
Indoor and Outdoor Dining in the Pointe 18 Bar & Grille
Monthly Member’s Only Golf, Tennis, & Social Events
Private Banquet and Meeting Facilities
Please contact our Membership Director, Dakota Neibarger, to tour the facility or gain more information about the club.
Phone: 407-876-5775 ext.6
Email:
Dneibarger@thegoldenbearclub.com

Welcome to our Members-Only section. You must use your email address and password to login. If you are not identified as a member in our database, you will not be permitted access. Please contact us at (407) 876-5775 so we can properly identify you as a member in our database.
